input.query:
fetch events
| filter event.type == "CUSTOM_CONFIGURATION" OR event.type == "CUSTOM_DEPLOYMENT" AND dt.entity.service == "{{`{{ event()['root_cause_entity_id'] }}`}}"
| filter remediationAction != "0" AND remediationAction != "" AND isNotNull(remediationAction)
| filter remediationType != "0" AND remediationType != "" AND isNotNull(remediationType)
| fields remediationAction, remediationType, timestamp
| sort timestamp DESC
